00028 void ScannerTimestampController::add_update_timestamp(Timestamp &ts) {
00029   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00030   m_update_timestamps.push_back(ts);
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 void ScannerTimestampController::remove_update_timestamp(Timestamp &ts) {
00035   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00036   UpdateTimestampContainer::nth_index<1>::type &sorted_index = m_update_timestamps.get<1>();
00037   sorted_index.erase(ts);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 bool ScannerTimestampController::get_oldest_update_timestamp(Timestamp *timestampp) {
00042   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00043   UpdateTimestampContainer::const_iterator iter = m_update_timestamps.begin();
00044   if (iter == m_update_timestamps.end()) {
00045     timestampp->clear();
00046     return false;
00047   }
00048   *timestampp = *iter;
00049   return true;
00050 }
